mapper.select: select diary.id, diary.author, diary.createDateTime, diary.describition, diary.images, diary.reportDate, diary.url, diary.tagId, tag.name as "tag.name", tag.color as "tag.color", tag.id as "tag.id", tag.isDelete as "tag.isDelete" from diary diary LEFT JOIN tag ON diary.tagId = tag.id where reportDate >= #{startTime} and reportDate <= #{endTime} and author=#{author} order by reportDate,tag.id
select * from diary where author=#{author} and reportDate=#{reportDate}
mapper.insert: insert into diary(id, reportDate, author, createDateTime, tagId,url, images, describition) values( #{id}, #{reportDate}, #{author}, #{createDateTime}, #{tagId}, #{url}, #{images}, #{describition} )
mapper.update: update diary set year=#{year}, month=#{month}, day=#{day}, reportDate=#{reportDate}, author=#{author}, creater=#{creater}, createDateTime=#{createDateTime}, duration=#{duration}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
